title: Rebecca Long-Bailey says Jeremy Corbyn should 'stand aside' if he loses next General Election
text:
Rebecca Long-Bailey claims that Jeremy Corbyn should “stand aside” if he loses the next General Election, as the Labour leader dodged questions about his ability to stay on.

In an interview earlier this week, John McDonnell stated that both he and the Labour leader would stand down in the face of electoral defeat.

The shadow business secretary echoed his sentiments, saying: “It's right for John to say in the event of us losing a General Election they would stand aside.”

“That is convention within the party," she told BBC One’s The Andrew Marr Show.

However, Mr Corbyn was more elusive on the issue.
